Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • Map
  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the map information, including the map name, gold required to win, and the map structure.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int goldRequired
      Integer representing the gold required to beat the game (From human's prospective)
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> map
      ArrayList of strings which represents the maps.
      private java.lang.String mapName
      String representing the map name
      private int minimumRequiredNumOfSpaces
      Integer representing the minimum number of spawnable spaces the map should contain

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Map​(int minimumRequiredNumOfSpaces)
      The constructor receives the minimum number of spaces the map should accomodate for (for placing bots and players)

    • Method Summary

      Changes the tile in coordinates position into the tile given

      Gets a coordinate and a tile and checks whether the type of tile in the coordinate is the same as the type of tile sent

      Loads in default map.

      Getter which returns the gold required to win

      Gets the number of columns in row y

      Gets the number of rows in the map

      • checkTile

        public boolean checkTile​(Coordinate position,
                         char tile)
        Gets a coordinate and a tile and checks whether the type of tile in the coordinate is the same as the type of tile sent
        Parameters:
        position - Coordinate representing the coordinates of the tile to check
        tile - character representing the type of tile to check
        Returns:
        boolean of whether the tile is the same type of tile as the one in the coordinates sent

      • changeTile

        protected void changeTile​(Coordinate position,
                          char tile)
        Changes the tile in coordinates position into the tile given
        Parameters:
        position - Coordinate representing the coordinates of the tile to change
        tile - character representing the type of tile to change to
